targets.expr:
(
  (
    (100 - cpu_idle{job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"})
    or
    (absent(cpu_idle{job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"}) * 0)
  )
  -
  on (alias)
  (
    cpu_system_load{job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"} +
    cpu_user_load{job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"}
  )
)
or
absent(cpu_idle{job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"}) * 0

100 * (
  physical_disk_free{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"} /
  on (job, alias, disk_partition)
  (
  physical_disk_free{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"} +
  physical_disk_used{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"})

)

100 * (
  physical_disk_used{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"} /
  on (job, alias, disk_partition)
  (
  physical_disk_free{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"} +
  physical_disk_used{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"})

)

100 * (
  physical_disk_free{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"} /
  on (job, alias, disk_partition)
  (
  physical_disk_free{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"} +
  physical_disk_used{job="physical_host", alias=~"$alias", disk_partition=~"$disk_partition"})

)

100 * (rate(net_drop_in{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval]) / 
    on (job, alias, interface)

 (
 rate(net_drop_in{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 + 
 rate(net_packets_recv{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 )
 )

100 * (rate(net_drop_out{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval]) / 
    on (job, alias, interface)

 (
 rate(net_drop_out{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 + 
 rate(net_packets_sent{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 )
 )

100 * (rate(net_err_in{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval]) / 
    on (job, alias, interface)

 (
 rate(net_err_in{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 + 
 rate(net_packets_recv{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 )
 )

100 * (rate(net_err_out{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval]) / 
    on (job, alias, interface)

 (
 rate(net_err_out{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 + 
 rate(net_packets_sent{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 )
 )

# 100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"}

(100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"})
or
absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"}) * 0

# (100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"}) - (cpu_system_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"} + cpu_user_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"})

(
  (
    (100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"})
    or
    (absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"}) * 0)
  )
  -
  (
    cpu_system_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"} +
    cpu_user_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"}
  )
)
or
absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias"}) * 0

# memory_swap_total{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"} - memory_swap_free{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"}
memory_swap_free{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias"}

panels.title: I/O Over Time - Physical Devices Only
